title: CRYSTALS + RITUALS - Womb healing - With Caressa
author: Name
description: A 3-month crystal ritual journey to heal your womb. Receive a package on your doorstep every month including beautiful crystals and other tools to perform a sacred womb healing ritual. Next to this package you'll have acces to our exclusive instagram sisterhood through which you'll receive reiki healings, womb-healing yoga classes, meditations, podcast episodes and there will be a special online cacao ceremony with Britta Waechter (€44 worth). Hold space for your womb and heal the deeper parts of yourself. Feel more connected, balanced and peaceful. Connect with the energy of the divine feminine within you. We start October 1st on the (full) harvest moon!
